#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[10001];
int main()
{ int t,i,x,j,n1,b=0,max;

  cin>>t;
  for(i=0;i<t;i++)
  {
    max=0;
    memset(a,0,sizeof a);
    cin>>n1;
    for(j=1;j<=n1;j++)
    {cin>>x;
     a[x]++;
     if(a[x]>max) { max=a[x];
                      b=x;
                       //cout<<a[x]<<" "<<b<<endl;
                  }
                  else if(a[x]==max) {

                    if(b>x) b=x;
                  }

     }
     cout<<b<<" "<<max<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
